author: ips
msg: added support for recursing more than one-level deep into imports/includes; added support for more than one xsd:schema element within the wsdl:types element; improved error checking/reporting

author: ips
msg: updated download links to point to 1.0alpha2 bits

author: ips
msg: added support for registering more than one propChanged event listener (see http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/APOLLO-3)

author: cutting
msg: Put src/test/nutch-site.xml on plugin test classpath, so that disabled
plugins are able to test themselves.

author: steveh
msg: Fix for BEEHIVE-431:  example in page flow users guide needs a minor fix
